name: Pokemon Oak Version and Maple Version
name_original: Pokemon Oak Version and Maple Version
description:
Pokemon Oak Version and Pokemon Maple Version are new fan made Pokemon games expanding upon the Pokemon series. It takes the damage system from Pokemon Legends Arceus and brings it over to the traditional style of Pokemon. If all your Pokemon on your team faint you still have one last chance. Use your own 2 fists against Pokemon as a last resort option. teach yourself new defensive and offensive techniques to help your 1-1 combat against trainers in the ring or Pokemon in the wild.

*WARNING* Trading between both games are compatible but may be a little bit buggy.
